scripts.test:full-suite: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.analyze: npm run build && node dist/index.js analyze
scripts.analyze:json: npm run build && node dist/index.js analyze --format=json
scripts.analyze:verbose: npm run build && node dist/index.js analyze --verbose
scripts.analyze:src: npm run build && node dist/index.js analyze ./src
scripts.analyze:src:json: npm run build && node dist/index.js analyze ./src --format=json
scripts.analyze:dictionary: npm run build && node dist/index.js analyze --dictionary
scripts.dictionary:init: npm run build && node dist/index.js dictionary init
scripts.dictionary:list: npm run build && node dist/index.js dictionary list
scripts.dictionary:validate: npm run build && node dist/index.js dictionary validate
scripts.bootstrap:init: npm run build && node dist/index.js bootstrap init
scripts.bootstrap:status: npm run build && node dist/index.js bootstrap status
scripts.bootstrap:validate: npm run build && node dist/index.js bootstrap validate
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run analyze
scripts.full-check: npm run security-check && npm run analyze:src
